# occlusionState

**Instance Property**

The occlusion state of the window.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var occlusionState: NSWindow.OcclusionState { get }
```

## Discussion

When the value of this property is [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSWindow/OcclusionState-swift.struct/visible], at least part of the window is visible; otherwise, the window is fully occluded.

## Managing Window Visibility and Occlusion State

- **isVisible**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the window is visible onscreen (even when it’s obscured by other windows).
